meanings.definition: The year or place in which wine, especially wine of high quality, was produced.
meanings.sent1: I love the taste of this vintage wine.
meanings.sent2: The vintage of this wine is from 1995.
meanings.sent3: At the party, everyone wanted a sip of the vintage wine.
meanings.sent4: The vintage of this wine is like a time capsule from the past.
meanings.sent5: The vintage wine had a rich and deep flavor that lingered on the palate.

meanings.definition: Denoting something from the past of high quality or lasting value.
meanings.sent1: She wore a vintage dress to the party.
meanings.sent2: The vintage car was a classic beauty.
meanings.sent3: His vintage style made him stand out in the crowd.
meanings.sent4: The vintage furniture added a touch of elegance to the room.
meanings.sent5: The vintage necklace sparkled with timeless beauty.

meanings.definition: A period of origin or manufacture.
meanings.sent1: The vintage of this car is from the 1960s.
meanings.sent2: The vintage of this watch dates back to the early 1900s.
meanings.sent3: In the museum, you can see vintage cars from different eras.
meanings.sent4: The vintage of this painting reflects the artist's early style.
meanings.sent5: The vintage of this house is from the Victorian era.
